mapper.select: SELECT TP.PNO, TP.PNAME, REGEXP_REPLACE(TP.PCONTENT, '<[^>]*>|&[^;]*;', '') AS PCONTENT, TP.PSTATUS, TP.PACCESS, TO_CHAR(TP.PSTARTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PSTARTDATE, TO_CHAR(TP.PENDDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PENDDATE , TP.USERID, VUD.MNAME, VUD.MRANK, VUD.DEPTNAME, PCOLOR , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER_PROJECT WHERE PNO= TP.PNO) AS COUNTMEMBER FROM ( SELECT * FROM PROJECT WHERE (USERID= #{USERID} OR PNO IN (SELECT PNO FROM MEMBER_PROJECT WHERE USERID=#{userid})) AND PSTATUS IN ('미진행', '진행', '보류') AND PACCESS IN ('ACCESS') ) TP JOIN V_U_DEPT VUD ON TP.USERID = VUD.USERID ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(PNO) DESC
